oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Aunt Jemima's Home Folks - 1952-04-01
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: 'Cousin' Louie Buck hosts Aunt Jemima's Home Folks, with Amanda Randolph as Aunt Jemima (unconfirmed).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Minnie Pearl; Home Folks; Grady Martin
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Louie Buck) -- Aunt Jemima jingle (Hank Williams, Minnie Pearl) -- Louie Buck introduces Aunt Jemima, Hank Williams and Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Pancake mix commercial and jingle (Aunt Jemima) -- Aunt Jemima commercial (Louie Buck) -- Aunt Jemima jingle (Hank Williams, Minnie Pearl) -- Hey, Good Lookin' (Hank Williams) -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Cotton Eyed Joe (Home Folks lead by Grady Martin) -- I Can't Help It (If I'm Still In Love With You) (Hank Williams) -- Buckwheat mix commercial and jingle (Aunt Jemima) -- Aunt Jemima commercial (Louie Buck) -- Aunt Jemima jingle (Hank Williams, Minnie Pearl) -- Are You Walkin' And Talkin' With The Lord (Home Folks) -- Closing statement (Hank Williams) -- Aunt Jemima Jingle (Hank Williams, Minnie Pearl) -- Closing statement (Louie Buck)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Aunt Jemima's Home Folks; Randolph, Amanda, 1902-1967; Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Minnie Pearl; Martin, Grady, 1929-
